experiences.description: Designed and delivered English language courses to adult learners older than myself. Applied modern teaching methodologies to promote comprehension and engagement while building intercultural communication skills and adapting to new cultural norms. Developed leadership and curriculum planning skills in an unfamiliar educational setting.
experiences.impact: Enhanced cross-cultural communication skills and gained experience in educational methodology

experiences.description: Worked closely with infants and caregivers in underserved communities. Gained exposure to early childhood health challenges and local pediatric care practices. This experience sparked a long-term interest in building tech solutions for early childhood health monitoring.
experiences.impact: Inspired development of health-focused technology solutions

experiences.description: Completed two cycles of internships at Tunisian Post Office, working in high-volume customer service environments. Learned how digital infrastructure intersects with real-world government services while assisting with documentation, logistics, and citizen-facing processes.
experiences.impact: Gained insights into government digital transformation and public sector workflows

experiences.description: Built a semantic search system to identify ingredients in North Indian recipes, addressing real-world challenges in food transparency and allergy awareness during a summer stay. Focused on safe cultural food exploration using vector-based search.
experiences.impact: Enabled safer ingredient discovery through semantic search
